title: Feast of Murder
description: The acclaimed author of Not A Creature Was Stirring offers a Thanksgiving mystery with all the trimmings. When retired FBI agent Gregor Demarkian is invited by a financial wizard to take a Thanksgiving cruise on his replica of the Mayflower, he never suspects that murder most foul and Wall Street's double-dealing are set to collide on the tiny ship--with lethal results.
author: Jane Haddam
